name: SOC 2 Type II
description: Service Organization Control 2 - Trust Services Criteria

controls.title: Control Environment
controls.description: The entity demonstrates a commitment to integrity and ethical values
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish and maintain a strong control environment that demonstrates commitment to integrity and ethical values.

controls.title: Board of Directors Oversight
controls.description: The board of directors demonstrates independence and exercises oversight of the development and performance of internal control
controls.implementationGuidance: Ensure the board of directors maintains independence and exercises proper oversight of internal controls.

controls.title: Management's Philosophy and Operating Style
controls.description: Management establishes oversight responsibilities for the system of internal control
controls.implementationGuidance: Document and communicate management's philosophy and operating style regarding internal controls.

controls.title: Communication and Information
controls.description: The entity obtains or generates and uses relevant, quality information to support the functioning of internal control
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish processes to ensure the entity obtains, generates, and uses relevant, quality information.

controls.title: Internal Communication
controls.description: The entity internally communicates information, including objectives and responsibilities for internal control, necessary to support the functioning of internal control
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement effective internal communication processes for control-related information.

controls.title: External Communication
controls.description: The entity communicates with external parties regarding matters affecting the functioning of internal control
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish procedures for communicating with external parties about internal control matters.

controls.title: Risk Assessment Process
controls.description: The entity specifies suitable objectives and identifies risks to the achievement of those objectives
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement a comprehensive risk assessment process to identify and evaluate risks to objectives.

controls.title: Fraud Risk
controls.description: The entity identifies and analyzes fraud risks
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish processes to identify, analyze, and address fraud risks.

controls.title: Control Activities
controls.description: The entity selects and develops control activities that contribute to the mitigation of risks to the achievement of objectives
controls.implementationGuidance: Select and develop appropriate control activities to mitigate identified risks.

controls.title: Control Activities Implementation
controls.description: The entity develops and uses control activities to mitigate risks to the achievement of objectives
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement and use control activities effectively to mitigate risks.

controls.title: Control Environment
controls.description: The entity selects, develops, and performs ongoing and/or separate evaluations to ascertain whether the components of internal control are present and functioning
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement ongoing and separate evaluations to ensure controls are present and functioning.

controls.title: Deficiencies in Internal Control
controls.description: The entity evaluates and communicates deficiencies in internal control to those responsible for taking corrective action
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish processes to evaluate and communicate control deficiencies for corrective action.

controls.title: Logical and Physical Access Security
controls.description: The entity implements logical access security software, infrastructure, and architectures over protected information assets to protect them from security events to meet the entity's objectives
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement comprehensive access controls to protect information assets from unauthorized access.

controls.title: Prior to Issuing System Credentials and Granting System Access
controls.description: The entity registers and authorizes new internal and external users before granting access to information assets
controls.implementationGuidance: Establish formal procedures for user registration and authorization before granting system access.

controls.title: The Entity Authorizes, Modifies, or Removes Access to Data, Software, and Hardware
controls.description: The entity authorizes, modifies, or removes access to data, software, and hardware to meet the entity's objectives
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement formal procedures for authorizing, modifying, and removing access to information assets.

controls.title: The Entity Restricts Access to Information Assets
controls.description: The entity restricts access to information assets to authorized users
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement controls to restrict access to information assets to authorized users only.

controls.title: The Entity Protects Against Malicious Software
controls.description: The entity protects against malicious software
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement comprehensive protection against malicious software and threats.

controls.title: The Entity Logs and Monitors System Access and Use
controls.description: The entity logs and monitors system access and use
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement comprehensive logging and monitoring of system access and use.

controls.title: The Entity Encrypts Data at Rest
controls.description: The entity encrypts data at rest
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement encryption for data at rest to protect sensitive information.

controls.title: The Entity Encrypts Data in Transit
controls.description: The entity encrypts data in transit
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement encryption for data in transit to protect information during transmission.
